description:
goprotobuf: Miscellaneous fixes.

- Support single quoted strings.
- Allow declaring import path to hint at a package name.

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=03ff7ddd4a7e ***

goprotobuf: Miscellaneous fixes.

- Support single quoted strings.
- Allow declaring import path to hint at a package name.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6366043

subject: code review 6366043: goprotobuf: Miscellaneous fixes.
